WRITING.TITLE: Based on the current state of events, what are your predictions for the second half of 2017?
WRITING.TEXT: Please provide an explanation on how today's issues or societal conditions will lead to what you predict. Be creative, but don't be absurd. Also, economic and political predictions will be highly appreciated.
cool, I'll look for those when I go grocery shopping. I mostly used Master facial cleanser. The green one which was anti-acne.
i'm from the Philippines. It costs around 550php online(around 11usd). Online prices are often cheaper than those in the store. 550php the cost of groceries for the whole week :(
